molecular.geometry¶

Functions¶

angle(a, b[, c, method, degrees])

Compute the angle between two vectors or three vertices.

cartesian_to_polar(a)

Convert Cartesian to polar coordinates.

cos_angle(a, b[, c])

Compute cosine of the angle between three points \(\angle ABC\).

cross(a, b)

Compute cross product between vectors a and b.

dihedral(a, b, c[, d])

Compute dihedral angle between four points.

distance(a[, b])

Compute the Euclidean distance between two vectors.

dot(a, b[, axis])

Compute vector dot product.

norm(a)

Compute vector norm.

normal(a, b[, c])

Compute normal vector between three points.

polar_to_cartesian(a)

Convert polar to Cartesian coordinates.

vector(a, b[, normed])

Compute vector between two sets of points.
